item.title: I am looking for someone who has a youtube cooking channel - Upwork
item.description:
I have a publishing company and want to publish a cookbook with recipes inside and at the bottom of each page a QR CODE that links to your youtube channel. In the youtube channel video you have to show the recipe preparation of each page from beginning to end.

The book contains about 100 recipes.

I pay $5 in TOTAL not per individual recipe, I know it is nothing but you gain free traffic and create content already that you need for your youtube channel since they come out about 100 videos (one per recipe)

PLEASE ONLY PEOPLE WHO WANT TO DO THIS

The book then will be translated into 4 languages and published in 16 states

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube
Skills: YouTube
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a 2D Animation Stick Figure Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Finance History/Facts
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-72 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Finance  niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Finance History Stories/Facts

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/kW6uIYcbniA?si=Kcku1YsjDBY20_3G

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- 2D art and animation experience
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “greencandle”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Automate creating short videos from a script using generative AI and image-to-video or text-to-video - Upwork
item.description:
I would like to speed up and automate the process of creating 4-minute videos of 16x9 animated images from scripts, perhaps using the ChatGPT API or Runway APIs and/or a discord bot for Pika or Midjourney. Right now I take every few sentences and make an image in ChatGPT, and then I upload the videos into the Pika discord to make a 3 second animation. I would like to have a faster and more automated way to do this.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 19:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Narrative Video, Promotional Video, Stock Footage, Video Editing, Python
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Narrative Video, Promotional Video, Stock Footage, Video Editing, Python

item.title: Spokesperson for Authentic UGC Video - Upwork
item.description:
Task and Process:

You will be recording a User-Generated Content (UGC) advertisement for our company. Here’s the process:

1- Receive Script: We will provide you with a short script, divided into small blocks of 1-2 sentences each.

2- Record Videos: Using your phone, record yourself reading each block. Aim for a conversational and authentic tone. The videos should be handheld to enhance authenticity.

3- Bite-Sized Clips: You will create 5-9 short videos, each corresponding to a script block.

4- Time Limit: The total duration of all the videos combined should be under 60 seconds (1 minute).

5- Upload Videos: Once recorded, upload your videos to the drive link we share with you.

Note: You are only responsible for recording the videos. You do NOT need to create scripts or edit the videos. We will handle the editing.

Budget: $65
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:50 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Casual Tone, Teen, Middle-Aged Adult, Video Commercial
Skills: Casual Tone, Teen, Middle-Aged Adult, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Creator and Bodybuilder/Weightlifter for Brand Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a highly skilled UGC creator with experience in bodybuilding or weightlifting to create 30 videos for our new brand and product. As a UGC creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging and high-quality videos that showcase our brand in a visually appealing way. The videos will primarily focus on demonstrating the effectiveness of our product and its benefits for bodybuilders and weightlifters.

Required Skills:
- Proficient in UGC creation and video editing
- Strong knowledge of bodybuilding or weightlifting techniques and exercises
- Ability to effectively communicate complex ideas through visual storytelling
- Familiarity with social media platforms and trends

If you are passionate about fitness, have a creative mindset, and can deliver exceptional videos that resonate with our target audience, we would love to hear from you.

Duration: 1 to 3 months
Size: Medium
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:43 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video/Audio AI Project - Selfie Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Self-Videos for AI mapping – Earn up to USD35

These are the languages we need now:
Tamil, Telugu, Russian, Cantonese, Mandarin, Turkish, Portuguese (Portugal), Italian, Spanish (Only from Spain - don't apply if you are native from Latin America) (Native only!)

Please check the PDF file for more details.

**** Do not apply if your accent is not native to these regions, as your videos may be rejected, and you could lose all your work. The positions for ENGLISH language are FILLED! ****

Job Description:
We wanted to share a project that our company is working on with Adobe, which involves crowdsourcing people for a video/audio AI project. It's a fun project where all you must do is record yourself answering some questions and upload the videos to a Google Drive. This project involves you recording up to 10 videos of yourself on your phone and answering a few simple questions. It will take 20 - 30 minutes to complete.

Please note that it may take 80 to 90 days to receive payment for
this job, after evaluation and approval of the videos.

As long as you use a modern phone with 4K video, follow the directions, record in 4K and 60 FPS, your video(s) should be approved and you will be paid for each video. As well, if your video is approved, you won’t have to submit more recordings. Your uploaded videos will be accepted as the final files, so submit up to 10.

The purpose of this project is to provide training data for AI Voice models from real people in everyday settings. Your video and audio will not be used to create a clone or replication and will not be seen or heard by anyone outside of Voxpe or the client.
Watch this video for a quick walkthrough of how to record yourself with the correct specifications.

If any of your friends and family members would like to participate in this project just let me know!


Please check the PDF file for more details.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Skills: M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Romanian Voiceover for YouTube Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented voiceover artist who can record a 1:30 minute voiceover in Romanian for a video that will be uploaded to YouTube. The voiceover needs to be clear, professional, and engaging. The video is about energy industry services. The ideal candidate should have a native-level proficiency in Romanian and a good understanding of the topic. Prior experience in voiceover work and knowledge of YouTube video requirements is a plus.

   Skills required:
   - Native-level proficiency in Romanian
   - Excellent pronunciation and articulation
   - Strong storytelling and narration skills
   - Ability to deliver high-quality recordings
   - Understanding of YouTube video requirements

We will need the deliverable in a .wav file with clean audio to make the final edit of the video.

   If you are a talented voiceover artist with a passion for creating engaging content, we would love to hear from you!

   Please provide samples of your previous work and let us know your availability.

   Size: Small
   Duration: Under 1 month
   Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $230
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male, Female, Romanian
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Male, Female, Romanian
Country: Mexico

Looking for a videographer comfortable with shooting on iPhone + Gimbal and has wireless mics to help with shooting content for small businesses. Editing is not needed.

Ability to do photos on professional camera in tandem would be ideal. Clients are mostly in South Jersey area so anyone in close proximity would be preferred.


Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:24 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera
Skills: Videography, Camera
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
